headline: Trump’s Pick for Wall Street Prosecutor Will Keep Apollo Stock
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump’s pick to police Wall Street’s financial crimes plans to hang onto holdings in Apollo Global Management, American Express and a digital asset platform, according to documents released Friday by the Office of Government Ethics. headline: Apollo: New Bullish Catalysts Emerge
summary: Apollo Global thrives with private credit gains, infrastructure growth, and retirement solutions. See why APO stock is a BUY for 12-15% annual returns.
